description:
Sailor Moon and the Sailor Guardians unite to save Earth from an alien force! When he was still a child, Mamoru gave a single rose as thanks to an alien boy who helped him cope with the loss of his parents. Since then, his long-forgotten friend Fiore has searched across the galaxy for a flower worthy of his gesture. Fioreâ€™s final choice is the beautiful Xenian flower, which has a very dark side.
Source: crunchyroll
